summary: A mysterious and highly skilled hit-woman in Hong Kong is paid to assassinate top-level crime bosses.
cast: Chien-Lien Wu|Ching Wan Lau|Jae-Suk Han|Shirley Wong|Ki-Ju Kim|Cheong-ryeon Oh|Cheong-woon Yu|Yeon-ju Kim|Benny Li Shuan Yan|Chi-Ping Chang|Dion Cheung|Kam-bon Cheung|Jung-il Choi|Kwok-Keung Choi|Ying Hau|Han-Chou Ho|Hee-tae Jeong|Yeon-joo Kim|Chih Tai Lin|Se-beom Park|Eok-seok Seo|Geum-sig Song|Kuo-ping Tsai|Hsiang Lin Yin

title: Más allá de la hipotermia
